frontmatter.title: My Sketchnotes and Thoughts from BaconBizConf 2013

prev.excerpt:
Consulting is something that I truly love. Helping businesses succeed, helping
employees to stop focusing on mundane repeatable tasks, helping enterprises
drive large scale commerce... these are truly activities that I enjoy. Getting
into the mix…

fields.title: What I Learned From Brennan Dunn's Consultancy Masterclass

next.excerpt:
After a year of working with a large AngularJS project, I thought I'd share a
few of the lessons that I learned in the process. Firstly, I love AngularJS. It
suits my needs exceedingly well, and I expect it will be my goto for the
forseeable future…

fields.title: Lessons Learned: A Year with a Large AngularJS Project
